channel.title: CVE Feed for ZoomIt -- ZoomSounds - WordPress Wave Audio Player with Playlist
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ZoomIt -- ZoomSounds - WordPress Wave Audio Player with Playlist

item.title: CVE-2021-39316|2024-08-04T02:06:41.609Z -- zoomit -- zoomsounds%20-%20wordpress%20wave%20audio%20player%20with%20playlist
item.description: The Zoomsounds plugin <= 6.45 for WordPress allows arbitrary files, including sensitive configuration files such as wp-config.php, to be downloaded via the `dzsap_download` action using directory traversal in the `link` parameter.
